project.name: Direct Air Capture Plant
project.description: Deploy a modular DAC facility capable of scaling with learning-by-doing cost reductions.
project.coBenefits: High-quality jobs in clean technology manufacturing hubs.
project.mrvStandard: ISO 14064-2, third-party verified

project.name: Landfill Methane Oxidation
project.description: Install modular oxidation covers for legacy landfills across multiple municipalities.
project.coBenefits: Improved local air quality and odor control for surrounding communities.
project.mrvStandard: EPA Method 21, continuous monitoring

project.name: Mangrove Restoration Programme
project.description: Restore and protect coastal mangrove ecosystems with community stewardship.
project.coBenefits: Storm surge protection and fisheries habitat co-benefits for coastal residents.
project.mrvStandard: Verra VM0033, 5-year monitoring

project.name: Agricultural Biochar Production
project.description: Convert agricultural waste into stable biochar for soil amendment using pyrolysis at 500-700Â°C.
project.coBenefits: Improved soil water retention and crop yields; reduced fertilizer needs.
project.mrvStandard: Puro.earth, H/C ratio > 0.7 verified

project.name: Forestry Residue Biochar
project.description: Process logging slash and forest thinnings into biochar with verified carbon permanence >1000 years.
project.coBenefits: Wildfire risk reduction; creates rural jobs in sustainable forestry.
project.mrvStandard: EBC certification, mass balance verified

project.name: Municipal Waste Biochar
project.description: Divert urban green waste from landfills to produce biochar for urban greening projects.
project.coBenefits: Reduced landfill methane; urban heat island mitigation through greening.
project.mrvStandard: Local government verification, quarterly audits

project.name: Coal Mine Methane Capture
project.description: Capture and oxidize ventilation air methane from active and abandoned coal mines.
project.coBenefits: Mine safety improvements; potential for local energy generation.
project.mrvStandard: CDM methodology ACM0008, flow metered

project.name: Dairy Anaerobic Digestion
project.description: Install covered lagoon digesters at dairy operations to capture methane for on-farm energy.
project.coBenefits: Farm energy independence; improved manure management and odor control.
project.mrvStandard: CAR Livestock Protocol, biogas flow metered

project.name: Rice Paddy Methane Reduction
project.description: Implement alternate wetting/drying irrigation to reduce methane emissions from rice cultivation.
project.coBenefits: Water conservation; potential yield improvements; farmer training programs.
project.mrvStandard: Verra VM0042, field sampling 3x/season

project.name: Oil & Gas Fugitive Emissions
project.description: Deploy LDAR (Leak Detection and Repair) program with infrared cameras and continuous monitoring.
project.coBenefits: Improved operational efficiency; regulatory compliance; safety enhancements.
project.mrvStandard: OGI Method 21, quarterly surveys

project.name: Seagrass Meadow Restoration
project.description: Restore degraded seagrass beds in coastal zones with long-term monitoring and protection.
project.coBenefits: Fishery nursery habitat; coastal erosion prevention; water quality improvement.
project.mrvStandard: Verra VM0033 (coastal wetlands), sediment core sampling

project.name: Kelp Forest Cultivation
project.description: Large-scale kelp farming with deep-ocean sinking for long-term carbon sequestration.
project.coBenefits: Marine biodiversity enhancement; potential for biofuel feedstock.
project.mrvStandard: Experimental protocol, ocean carbon flux towers

project.name: Salt Marsh Conservation
project.description: Protect and restore tidal salt marshes threatened by development and sea-level rise.
project.coBenefits: Storm surge buffering; critical habitat for migratory birds; recreation.
project.mrvStandard: Plan Vivo coastal protocol, annual biomass surveys

project.name: Enhanced Olivine Weathering
project.description: Distribute crushed olivine on agricultural lands and coastal zones to accelerate CO2 mineralization.
project.coBenefits: Soil pH improvement; potential crop yield benefits; reduced ocean acidification.
project.mrvStandard: Geochemical modeling + field validation, pending standard

project.name: Concrete CO2 Mineralization
project.description: Inject captured CO2 into concrete during mixing, permanently mineralizing carbon in building materials.
project.coBenefits: Improved concrete strength; reduced cement usage; scalable to construction sector.
project.mrvStandard: ISO 14064-2, mass balance with compression data

project.name: Regenerative Agriculture Transition
project.description: Support farmers transitioning to no-till, cover crops, and rotational grazing practices.
project.coBenefits: Improved soil health and resilience; biodiversity gains; farmer profitability.
project.mrvStandard: Soil sampling 30cm depth, 3-year baseline

project.name: Agroforestry Silvopasture
project.description: Integrate trees into pasture systems for carbon sequestration while maintaining livestock production.
project.coBenefits: Shade and welfare for livestock; diversified farm income; erosion control.
project.mrvStandard: CAR Forest Protocol adapted for agroforestry

project.name: Cement Plant CCUS Retrofit
project.description: Retrofit existing cement plant with carbon capture system to reduce process emissions.
project.coBenefits: Industry decarbonization leadership; potential for CO2 utilization products.
project.mrvStandard: EPA Subpart H, continuous emissions monitoring

project.name: Green Hydrogen Steel Production
project.description: Deploy hydrogen direct reduction iron (H-DRI) technology to eliminate coal use in steelmaking.
project.coBenefits: Air quality improvements; technology demonstration for industrial transition.
project.mrvStandard: Process emissions calculation, hydrogen consumption metered

project.name: Peatland Rewetting Project
project.description: Restore degraded peatlands by raising water tables to stop carbon emissions from oxidation.
project.coBenefits: Biodiversity recovery; flood water storage; wildfire risk reduction.
project.mrvStandard: Verra VMD0053, water table monitoring + eddy covariance

project.name: Native Species Afforestation
project.description: Establish new forests on degraded lands using locally-adapted native tree species mixes.
project.coBenefits: Watershed protection; habitat connectivity; community engagement in planting.
project.mrvStandard: Verra VCS Afforestation, remote sensing + plot sampling

project.name: Bamboo Plantation CDR
project.description: Fast-growing bamboo cultivation with harvest for durable products and biochar production.
project.coBenefits: Rapid biomass growth; sustainable building materials; erosion control.
project.mrvStandard: Allometric equations, harvest records verified
